name: Auto Deployment with Prisma Migrations

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: ðŸš€ Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Node.js 20
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20

      - name: Setup SSH Key
        run: |
          mkdir -p ~/.ssh
          echo "${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}" > ~/.ssh/id_ed25519
          chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_ed25519
          ssh-keyscan -H ${{ secrets.SSH_HOST }} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts

      - name: ðŸ”„ Pull Latest Code on Server
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@v1.0.3
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.SSH_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.SSH_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}
          script: |
            cd /var/www/api/mydocngApi
            git pull origin master

      - name: ðŸ“‚ Copy Files to Server via SSH
        uses: appleboy/scp-action@v0.1.7
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.SSH_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.SSH_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}
          source: "."
          target: "/var/www/api/mydocngApi"

      - name: ðŸš€ Deploy & Restart App
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@v1.0.3
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.SSH_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.SSH_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}
          script: |
            cd /var/www/api/mydocngApi
            yarn install --frozen-lockfile
            npx prisma generate
            npx prisma migrate deploy
            yarn build
            pm2 startOrReload ecosystem.config.js --update-env
